Description: Chateau_s Rooftop provides an unparalleled outdoor nightlife experience. Located beneath the iconic replica of the Eiffel Tower at Paris Las Vegas, the space spans 22,000 square feet and offers a dancefloor, high-energy lighting, VIP bottle service and panoramic views of the Las Vegas skyline. With panoramic views of the Strip, including the Fountains of Bellagio, locals and visitors, alike, partake in a never-ending party and revel in the glitz and glamour of Las Vegas.INDUSTRY NIGHT AT CHATEAUChateau Wedesdays, the nightclub_s industry night, offers complimentary admission to locals with ID on Wedesday nights.MOON TOWER ThuDAYSThe club_s throwback night, Moon Tower Thudays, feature hits from the 80s and 90s.ABOUT EACH ROOMMain RoomA one-of-a-kind ascending spiraled staircase leads guests to Chateau_s second-floor entrance revealing an intricate interior inspired by elements of old world d_cor fused with modern French design. VIP seating surrounds the centralized dance floor, showcasing vaulted ceilings, state-of-the art lighting and sound systems, ornate chandeliers and a DJ booth centered above a 10-foot-tall marble mantel fireplace.The RooftopChateau Rooftop brings forth an unparalleled outdoor nightlife experience. Located under the Eiffel Tower on the rooftop of the indoor nightclub, overlooking the spectacular Fountains, Chateau Rooftop spans 22,000 square feet in an unparalleled setting beneath the stars. The picturesque nightspot offers a full nightclub experience with an exciting rooftop dance floor, high-energy lighting, VIP bottle service and panoramic views from high above the Vegas Strip.THE CHATEAU NIGHTCLUB DRESS CODE:Upscale party attire, with dress shoes, collared shirts and blazers suggested for menHOW TO BOOK RESERVATIONSFor reservations at Chateau Nightclub & Rooftop call: 702-776-7777
Location: 3655 Las Vegas Boulevard South Las Vegas , NV 89109
